questions.question: What is the 'this' keyword in Java used for?

choices.choice: To refer to the current object

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'extends' keyword in Java?

choices.choice: To inherit properties from another class

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'super' keyword in Java?

choices.choice: To refer to the parent class

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'abstract' keyword in Java?

choices.choice: To declare a class that cannot be instantiated

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'final' keyword in Java?

choices.choice: To prevent a method from being overridden
